easy.question: Term Data Structure refers to _________ and interrelationship between them.
Data is nothing but ____________.
Single and non-decomposable data is called ______________.
Stack in Data Structure is ___________.
In the stack process of inserting an element in the stack is called as ___________.
Generally collection of Nodes is called as __________.
Queue in Data Structure is ___________.
A program is a sequence of ________________ written in a programming language.
Each program can have ___________.
Operation of inserting data into program and taking data out of program is called _____________ operation.
Computer that requests the resources or data from other computer is called as ________ computer.
Software which allows user to view the webpage is called as __________.
Which of the following website is used to search other website by typing a keyword ?
Database is collection of ____.
DBMS should provide following feature(s) ______.
Javascript is _________ language.
JavaScript is designed for following purpose -
options: To Perform Server Side Scripting Opertion
To Execute Query Related to DB on Server
To add interactivity to HTML Pages.
easy.answer: To add interactivity to HTML Pages

easy.question: Which of the statement we need to write , in order to check any condition.
Which of the following is not an example of looping statement ?
Which of the following tool used to execute java code.

medium.question: '===' operator is _______________.
options: Is identical (is equal to and is of the same type)
Is identical (is equal to and is of the different type)
medium.answer: Is identical (is equal to and is of the same type)

medium.question: '+=' operator can operate on following data values.
'Add and Assignment' operator is shown by this symbol.
Which of the following is not an logical operator ?
'++' is __________ type of operator.
'++' can operate only on ________________.
Integer Variable + Character Variable + Undefined Variable = ______________ Value
Which of the following is not a comparison operator ?
Adding String and Integer always results in _________.
Variable can hold ________ value at a time
We can declare ___________ at a time. Select most appropriate option.
Spaces,Punctuation marks are called as __________ Symbols in JavaScript.
Initialization of variable can be done by writing _____ operator in between variable name and operand value.
Multiple Declarations of variables are separated by ___________ symbol
Local Variables are Destroyed as soon as ______________.
What will be the postfix expression for following infix expression 'b * c + d / e'
Stack cannot be used to -
options: Evaluation of Expression in Postfix form

medium.question: Which of the following is useful in the implementation of quick sort ?
Stack can be implemented using ___________ and _________.
HTML tags are used to describe document ___________.

hard.question: Consider the Singly linked list having n elements. What will be the time taken to add an node at the end of linked list if Pointer is initially pointing to first node of the list.
Pointer is pointing to the first element of the Node then time require to Insert Element to second position is __________.
Consider a linked list of n elements. What is the time taken to insert an element after element pointed by same pointer ?
The concatenation of two lists is to be performed in O(1) time. Which of the following implementations of a list could be used ?
Time require to find any element of the linked list is _______.
Which of the following is true about linked list implementation of queue?
options: in push operation, if new nodes are inserted at the beginning of linked list, then in pop operation, nodes must be removed from end
In push operation, if new nodes are inserted at the end, then in pop operation, nodes must be removed from the beginning

hard.question: Which of the following is correct recurrence for worst case of Binary Search?
Which of the following is not a stable sorting algorithm in its typical implementation.

Suppose we are sorting an array of eight integers using quicksort, and we have just finished the first partitioning with the array looking like this:
2  5  1  7  9  12  11  10
 Which statement is correct?
options: The pivot could be either the 7 or the 9.
The pivot could be the 7, but it is not the 9
The pivot is not the 7, but it could be the 9
Neither the 7 nor the 9 is the pivot.
hard.answer: The pivot could be either the 7 or the 9.
